plot: Four stories about the arts of not getting married. Alfredo Landa performs the roles of a lawyer who has just finished his military service, a young marquis on his wedding day, a flirt and a soldier who deals with three girls at the same time.   Written by  Miguel Ángel Díaz González
title: El arte de no casarse
plot_es: Four stories about the arts of not getting married. Alfredo Landa performs the roles of a lawyer who has just finished his military service, a young marquis on his wedding day, a flirt and a soldier who deals with three girls at the same time.   Written by  Miguel Ángel Díaz González
plot_en: Four stories about the arts of not getting married. Alfredo Landa performs the roles of a lawyer who has just finished his military service, a young marquis on his wedding day, a flirt and a soldier who deals with three girls at the same time.   Written by  Miguel Ángel Díaz González

director.role: (segments &"No de las niñas, El&" and &"Soldadito, El&") (as J. Font-Espina)
director.name: José María Font

cast.role: Lolita - criada / Novia del marqués / Trini - criada / Lucía - criada novia de Pascual
cast.name: Concha Velasco

cast.role: Alfonso de la Peña y Peña, abogado
cast.name: Alfredo Landa
